column2: ND DRIVERS LICENSE TEST

1. A flashing red light means:
column6: The light will soon change to steady red.
column10: The same as a STOP sign.

column2: 6. You can pass on the right:

column6: when a vehicle ahead makes a left turn.
column8: when a vehicle ahead makes a right turn.

column2: 7. ___________ are the most frequent fatality in work zone crashes.
8. When you see an emergency vehicle with flashing lights behind you, you should:
column4: disregard the signal if there are other lanes available for the emergency vehicle.
column6: keep moving slowly, staying to the right side of the road.
column8: slow down, provide a clear path for the emergency vehicle and stop.
column10: immediately come to a complete stop.

column2: 9. When you pass another vehicle, before you return to the right lane, you must:

column8: make sure you can see the front bumper of the vehicle you passed.

column2: 10. Yellow traffic signs:

column8: Slow down and be prepared to stop if necessary

column2: 13. Drivers must yield to pedestrians:

column6: only if the pedestrian is on the same side of the road.

column2: 14. When approaching someone using a white cane, you should proceed with caution because:
column8: the pedestrian might be using a guide dog.

column4: they will soon be facing oncoming traffic.

column8: The use of headlight is required by law.

column2: 20. A large vehicle is backing up to unload goods. You should:
column4: enter one of the blind spots and wait.
column6: be patient and wait until the large vehicle has completed its backup maneuver.

column2: 21. Before entering a traffic circle, drivers must slow down and yield to ___________ in the traffic circle.
22. An emergency vehicle that uses lights and a siren can be unpredictable. Why?
column6: Emergency vehicle drivers are not required to be careful.
column8: The driver can legally pass red lights.
column10: Emergency vehicles must go faster than the posted speed limit when it is safe to do so.

column2: 23. When you see an emergency vehicle with flashing lights, you must:

column2: 25. Drivers may continue carefully through a yellow light if:
